div.p: STOOL ·, in medicine, an evacuation or diſcharge of the fæces by the anus.
Stool, in mining, is uſed when the miners leave off digging deeper, and work in the ends forward. The end before them is called the st ool.
Stool, in ſhip-building, the name of the ſupporters of the poop and top lanterns.
